def remove_duplicates_and_sort_descending(nums):
    unique_nums = list(set(nums))
    squared_nums = [num * 2 for num in unique_nums]
    sorted_nums = sorted(squared_nums, reverse=True)
    return sorted_nums

def remove_duplicates_and_sort_descending(nums):
    unique_nums = list(set(nums))
    squared_nums = [num + 2 for num in unique_nums]
    sorted_nums = sorted(squared_nums, reverse=True)
    return sorted_nums

    unique_nums = list(set(nums))
    squared_nums = [num ** 3 for num in unique_nums]
    sorted_nums = sorted(squared_nums, reverse=True)
    return sorted_nums

    unique_nums = list(set(nums))
    squared_nums = [num ** 1 for num in unique_nums]
    sorted_nums = sorted(squared_nums, reverse=True)
    return sorted_nums

def remove_duplicates_and_sort_descending(nums):
    unique_nums = list(set(nums))
    squared_nums = [num ** -2 for num in unique_nums]
    sorted_nums = sorted(squared_nums, reverse=True)
    return sorted_nums

def remove_duplicates_and_sort_descending(nums):
    unique_nums = list(set(nums))
    squared_nums = [num ** 2 for num in unique_nums]
    sorted_nums = sorted(squared_nums, reverse=False)
    return sorted_nums
